item.title: Report E-2023100710
item.description:
Report E-2023100710

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-11
  • City: VALPARAISO
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On October 11, 2023, one (1) 337-gallon tote of UN3266 leaked approximately one-half (0.5) gallon of product to the trailer interior due to a loose lid. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from HazChem Environmental (HCE) to remediate the impacted site. HCE personnel deployed granular absorbents and soda ash to the sodium hydroxide-impacted trailer and swept them in with hand tools. All spent absorbents and the damaged containers were collected and containerized into two (2) 55-gallon drums for transport and disposal.

item.title: Report E-2023100667
item.description:
Report E-2023100667

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-23
  • City: PLAINFIELD
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XIN experienced a UN3266 ProClean Egg Wash release from a 275-gallon poly tote. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 10-gallons of product released to an 8' x 9' area of the trailer floor and a 20' x 4' area of the concrete lot below the trailer floor due to a pallet puncture. The material was transferred from the damaged tote into a new one. Absorbents and citric acid solution were utilized to clean and neutralize all impacted areas. The damaged tote was then cut up and containerized along with all cleanup debris into (3) 55-gallon poly drums. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2023100192
item.description:
Report X-2023100192

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-31T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-21
  • City: EVANSVILLE
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package went out for delivery, but was unable to be delivered due to customer not being available to receive it. It was brought back to station, where it was later discovered to be leaking. Package was then contained in a red hazmat tote and was dealt with accordingly. DescribePack: Leakage was due to cap failure. Caps were loose and spillage happened, causing the caps to corrode so they no longer turn. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Immediate containment

item.title: Report X-2023100155
item.description:
Report X-2023100155

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-31T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-21
  • City: EVANSVILLE
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The hazmat bucket was incorrectly placed onto the IC belt which resulted in the bucket falling off onto lid and breaking seal, allowing solution to leak. QA responded by placing the bucket into a red hazmat tote with a blue liner using hazmat gloves as this solution is corrosive. DescribePack: The package failed at the seal, the lid came off slightly and when attempting to correct it, the rubber seal would not snap back into place leading to leakage of solution from top of container. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The liquid that had released was cleaned up off of the ground, the bucket was placed in a tote with a liner and covered to prevent contact with anything else.
